word: "TO SEE A COARSE, HARD-HEARTED MAN, POSSESSING IN HIS VERY NATURE BUT LITTLE MORE TENDERNESS THAN A CROCODILE, AND NEARLY AS DESTITUTE OF MORAL RELIGIOUS TRAINING AS A HYENA, SHEDDING HYPOCRITICAL TEARS FOR EFFECT, IS ENOUGH TO STIR THE MIRTHFULNESS OF THE GRAVEST SAINT."--LI 115, 116 (1868).
